title: Americans captured in Ukraine could face the death penalty; 'Calm before the storm' as Russians regroup in the east
content:
1. Americans captured in Ukraine could face the death penalty; 'Calm before the storm' as Russians regroup in the east  CNBC
  2. Captured Russian pilot turns out to be Wagner mercenary  Yahoo News
  3. U.S. fighter in Ukraine glad to see friends alive, even in Russian hands  CBS Mornings
  4. Russia can't guarantee that U.S. vets captured in Ukraine won’t face the death penalty  NBC News
  5. Russian official says two captured US military veterans should be ‘held responsible’ for the crimes they committed  The Hill
contentSnippet:
Americans captured in Ukraine could face the death penalty; 'Calm before the storm' as Russians regroup in the east  CNBC
Captured Russian pilot turns out to be Wagner mercenary  Yahoo News
U.S. fighter in Ukraine glad to see friends alive, even in Russian hands  CBS Mornings
Russia can't guarantee that U.S. vets captured in Ukraine won’t face the death penalty  NBC News
Russian official says two captured US military veterans should be ‘held responsible’ for the crimes they committed  The Hill

localize.title: ウクライナで捕らえられたアメリカ人は死刑になる可能性がある、ロシアが東部で再編成する「嵐の前の静けさ
在乌克兰被捕的美国人可能面临死刑；俄罗斯人在东部重新集结，"暴风雨前的宁静"。
在烏克蘭被捕的美國人可能面臨死刑；俄羅斯人在東部重新集結，"暴風雨前的寧靜"。
